metadata.title: CVE-2022-48775 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:Drivers: hv: vmbus: Fix memory leak in vmbus_add_channel_kobjkobject_init_and_add() takes reference even when it fails.According to the doc of kobject_init_and_add()?   If this function returns an error, kobject_put() must be called to   properly clean up the memory associated with the object.Fix memory leak by calling kobject_put().

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
